title: "GAN Theft Auto Is A Neural Network Based On NVIDIA GameGAN"
excerpt: "Thanks to Artificial Intelligence, Researchers have created a new AI-trained game engine called GAN Theft Auto which imitates the driving experience in GTA V. The engine was created by developing and training a NVIDIA GameGAN based neural network."
